data.message: What do you "think" I was not able to understand what the boy felt in this song? What do you "think" that I had never felt such pain? Why do you "think" and this spite of everything that I tell you, I had never felt, what it is to attract negative things causes fear? If you'd let me talk about cfor.fanny, you would long ago that I understood very well that boy, and never by "mediocrity" or "meanness", I would wanted it falls! Now, I am positive, optimistic, and I choose be completely Happy!!!
